mapper.update:
update kt_scientific_research
scientific_research_id = #{scientificResearchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
the_title = #{theTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
the_time = #{theTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
the_abstracts = #{theAbstracts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
the_result = #{theResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
the_approach = #{theApproach,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
the_background = #{theBackground,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
the_conclusion = #{theConclusion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
the_author = #{theAuthor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
the_source = #{theSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
the_journal = #{theJournal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
the_url = #{theUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
the_pmid = #{thePmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
the_sort = #{theSort,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=BIGINT},
created_way = #{createdWay,jdbcType=INTEGER},
created_by_key = #{createdByKey,jdbcType=CHAR},
created_by_name = #{createdByName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
check_state = #{checkState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
check_report = #{checkReport,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
checked_by_key = #{checkedByKey,jdbcType=CHAR},
checked_by_name = #{checkedByName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where research_key = #{researchKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update kt_scientific_research set scientific_research_id = #{scientificResearchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, the_title = #{theTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, the_time = #{theTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, the_abstracts = #{theAbstracts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, the_result = #{theResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, the_approach = #{theApproach,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, the_background = #{theBackground,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, the_conclusion = #{theConclusion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, the_author = #{theAuthor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, the_source = #{theSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, the_journal = #{theJournal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, the_url = #{theUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, the_pmid = #{thePmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, the_sort = #{theSort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=BIGINT}, created_way = #{createdWay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, created_by_key = #{createdByKey,jdbcType=CHAR}, created_by_name = #{createdByName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
check_report = #{checkReport,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
checked_by_key = #{checkedByKey,jdbcType=CHAR},
checked_by_name = #{checkedByName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
check_state = #{checkState,jdbcType=INTEGER} where research_key = #{researchKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update kt_scientific_research set check_state = #{checkState,jdbcType=BIGINT}, checked_by_key = #{checkedByKey,jdbcType=CHAR}, checked_by_name = #{checkedByName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, check_report = #{checkReport} where research_key = #{researchKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT count(research_key) from kt_scientific_research where check_state=#{checkState} and created_way=#{createdWay}
SELECT count(research_key) from kt_scientific_research where (created_at BETWEEN #{firstTime} and #{currentTime}) AND check_state=#{checkState} and created_way=#{createdWay}
